nodes.excerpt: 🍞 Jam is an open source implementation of audio spaces (think: Clubhouse, Twitter Spaces, Orbit, …). Jam lets you can create rooms that can be used for panel discussions, jam sessions, free flowing conversations, debates, theatre plays, musicals and more.

nodes.author: Thomas Schranz ⛄️

localize.tagline: 您自己的小型会议和朋友聚会的会所版本。

nodes.excerpt: Binndle is a simple app to find and share the products people use. Find out what software your peers use, or what books your idol has read, and then share your daily tools too.

localize.description: Binndle是一款简单的应用，可以找到并分享人们使用的产品。找出你的同龄人用了什么软件，或者你的偶像读了什么书，然后也分享你的日常工具。
localize.tagline: 寻找人们使用的产品

localize.description: Binndle是一款簡單的應用，可以找到並分享人們使用的產品。找出你的同齡人用了什麼軟件，或者你的偶像讀了什麼書，然後也分享你的日常工具。
localize.tagline: 尋找人們使用的產品

nodes.excerpt: With our easy 1-step setup process, you can analyse the results of all your email marketing campaigns and truly understand which clicks are hot, which clicks are not and the areas that get the most clicks.

localize.tagline: 为您的所有电子邮件营销活动创建热图。

nodes.excerpt: Editable gives you the simplest way to make your videos intuitively annotated and easily marked up. Contrary to high-quality design editors like Photoshop’s paint brush or Final Cut Pro’s screen management, it just provides simple annotation experiences.

localize.description: Editable为你提供了一种最简单的方式，让你的视频直观地注释并轻松地标记起来。与Photoshop的画笔或Final Cut Pro的屏幕管理等高质量的设计编辑器不同，它只是提供简单的注释体验。
localize.tagline: 直接对任何视频文件进行注释

nodes.excerpt: Think your company is data driven? Probably. But how do you ensure your data is creating real value for your customers? In this eBook, you’ll learn how use your data to: 👩🏼‍💻 Empower your customers 🏆 Improve your product offering 📈 Drive enduring growth

localize.tagline: 如何通过面向用户的分析来推动增长？

nodes.excerpt: Swifter is an AI-based email subject-line generator (using GPT-3). Swifter supports 5 types of email (welcome, abandoned cart, discount, pain-points, goal events) and 3 tones (friendly, bold, professional) and works for both B2B and B2C emails.

localize.description: 爲您的社交媒體、演示和營銷創建令人驚歎的視頻--沒有任何麻煩。在短時間內製作一個視頻（如上圖）。可能性是無窮無盡的。
localize.tagline: 令人難以置信的簡單的視頻製作器，用於營銷和通訊。

nodes.excerpt: Keyword Staking is a term for committing your PRE tokens to a specific word or term. If you stake the most tokens to a given keyword, your ad will show up when someone searches for that term on Presearch - the decentralized search engine.
nodes.title: Presearch - Keyword Staking - Keyword Advertising: A $100 billion dollar opportunity
nodes.author: Alex Carrabre

localize.description: Keyword Staking是一个术语，用于将你的PRE代币承诺给一个特定的单词或术语。如果你将最多的代币押注到一个给定的关键词上，当有人在Presearch--去中心化的搜索引擎上搜索这个词时，你的广告就会显示出来。
localize.tagline: 关键字广告。千亿美元的机会

localize.description: Keyword Staking是一個術語，用於將你的PRE代幣承諾給一個特定的單詞或術語。如果你將最多的代幣押注到一個給定的關鍵詞上，當有人在Presearch--去中心化的搜索引擎上搜索這個詞時，你的廣告就會顯示出來。
localize.tagline: 關鍵字廣告。千億美元的機會
